Description:
Our client is a leading Transportation and Logistics company. They are now looking for an Operations Assistant to join them. Roles & Responsibilities:Arranging local transport.
Coordinating between airport operations and office staff.
Managing trucking cost and finding best solutions.
Planning shipments pickups and deliveries
Consolidations to save costSalary: AED 4000 - AED 4500Skills
Skills:
Immediate Joiners
Problem-solving skills
The ability to plan work and meet deadlines
 Accuracy and attention to details

A Bachelor’s degree
Minimum of 1 years’ experience of working in operations
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
